tool_input.new_string:
def test_snake_move_right(self):
        """Test that snake moves right correctly"""
        snake = Snake(5, 5)
        snake.move()
        self.assertEqual(snake.body[0], (6, 5))
    
    def test_snake_change_direction(self):
        """Test that snake can change direction"""
        snake = Snake(5, 5)
        snake.change_direction(Direction.UP)
        self.assertEqual(snake.direction, Direction.UP)
